headline: Applied Materials (NasdaqGS:AMAT) Declares US$0.46 Per Share Quarterly Dividend
summary: Applied Materials (NasdaqGS:AMAT) recently announced a dividend increase, which coincided with its 16.6% share price rise over the last quarter. The dividend boost, coupled with robust Q2 earnings that reported higher sales and net income, likely bolstered investor confidence. These outcomes align with broader market trends, as the S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite also experienced gains driven by easing inflation concerns and progress in U.S.-China trade talks. The company's stock buyback program...
